name: @cloudflare/sandbox
description: A sandboxed environment for running commands

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsup src/*.ts --outDir dist --dts --sourcemap --format esm
scripts.docker:publish: cd ../.. && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f packages/sandbox/Dockerfile --build-arg SANDBOX_VERSION=$npm_package_version -t cloudflare/sandbox:$npm_package_version --push .
scripts.docker:publish:beta: cd ../.. && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f packages/sandbox/Dockerfile --build-arg SANDBOX_VERSION=$npm_package_version -t cloudflare/sandbox:$npm_package_version-beta --push .
